headline: Hate group membership continues dropping as right-wing extremism goes mainstream
author: Travis Gettys
sentences: The antidemocratic right rejects equality and pluralism in favor of a hierarchical society where certain groups hold more power, and Fox News broadcaster Tucker Carlson and Republican lawmakers such as Reps. Matt Gaetz (R-FL) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ) openly promote the white nationalist "great replacement" myth to stoke violent anger against racial, religious and sexual minorities.

The Southern Poverty Law Center documented 1,221 hate and anti-government extremist groups active last year in the U.S., but the civil rights organization's annual report found that decline demonstrates how the reactionary right has gained influence over the Republican Party since the election of Donald Trump.
